(GraphicsLayer
  (bounds 800.00 600.00)

      (bounds 800.00 600.00)
      (contentsOpaque 1)
      (drawsContent 1)

        (GraphicsLayer
          (position 18.00 10.00)
          (bounds 250.00 200.00)
          (contentsOpaque 1)
          (drawsContent 1)
          (backgroundColor #C0C0C0)
          (children 1
            (GraphicsLayer
              (position 35.00 10.00)
              (transformOrigin 145.00 50.00)
              (bounds 195.00 100.00)
              (drawsContent 1)
              (backgroundColor #0000FF)
            )
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
